title: Skins Give Disadvantages?
body: I swear ever since I bought the Gladiator Draven skin people are dodging my ults lots because of the ultimate turns orange when you throw it.

replies.body:
I mean, there are the slightest changes in a bunch of skins (One of the new veigar skins is one of the better ones, because the W is harder to see/the animation of casting is harder to spot)

But in general minimal changes will happen between skins especially that drastic a change (people dodging it more)
